knimeNode.name: Google New Spreadsheet Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Write a table to a new spreadsheet in Google Sheets.

fullDescription.intro: Writes the input table to a new spreadsheet's sheet in Google Sheets. The node outputs a table containing the created spreadsheet's name and id, as well as the sheet's name.
fullDescription.option: The name of the spreadsheet to be created.
The name of the sheet to which the table should be written.
Whether the column names should be written in the first row.
Whether the row ids should be written i the first column.
Whether the cells should be written in raw format. E.g. so that "=xy" is not interpreted as a formula.

ports.inPort: Table to be written to a google sheet
ports.outPort: Table containing the spreadsheet name, sheet name and spreadsheet ID.
